freezeReputation(address,uint256).details: Calculates decay and applies it before freezing. Requirements: - `_frozenUntilEpoch` must be greater than the current epoch.

params._frozenUntilEpoch: The epoch that reputation will no longer be frozen.

params._account: The address to query the balance of. Requirements: - If a user's balance is frozen, no reputation is available.

getPendingDecay(address).details: This function assumes that anywhere decay is written to storage, the      account's frozenUntilEpoch is set to 0.

params._account: The address to retreive decay of.
The address to retreive reputation info of.
The address to lock reputation for.
params._amount: The amount of reputation to lock.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._decayInterval: The block length of an epoch. Requirements: - Only the owner can call this function.
params._decayRate: The amount of reputation decay per epoch.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._account: The address to retreive decay of.
params._amount: The amount of reputation to unlock.

freezeReputation(address,uint256).notice: Freeze a user's reputation for a given number of epochs.

getAvailableReputation(address).notice: Returns the available reputation token balance after accounting for the         amounts locked and pending decay.

getPendingDecay(address).notice: Get the amount of reputation of an account that has decayed since          the last decay epoch.

getReputationAccountInfo(address).notice: Get the reputation info of an account.

lockReputation(address,uint256).notice: Lock reputation for a given account.

setDecayConfig(uint256,uint256).notice: Change the decay parameters of the reputation token.

unlockReputation(address,uint256).notice: Reduce the amount of locked reputation for a given account.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ReputationToken: Only the module can call this function."

arguments.value: ReputationToken: Only the module can call this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ReputationToken: Only the module can call this function."

documentation.text:
@notice Get the reputation info of an account.
 @param _account The address to retreive reputation info of.
